column2: select a.gal_id, a.ra, a.dec, a.z, b.group_id, c.ra as group_ra, c.dec as group_dec, c.z as group_z, d.n_member as group_n, c.group_mass, c.halo_mass_# as halo_mass, c.flag_halo_mass_# as flag_halo_mass, c.mean_sep_# as mean_sep from mydb.sdss7 as a join mydb.ipetroA_# as b on b.gal_id = a.gal_id join mydb.petroA_group as c on c.group_id = b.group_id join mydb.group_member as d on d.group_id = b.group_id where b.flag_massive = # and c.f_edge > # and d.n_member > # into mydb.index_central order by a.gal_id
